name: Prospector (TheRotBot)
description: You've lost it all gambling again. Your wife and child move East, and with time ticking, you need to come up with $5,000 in the next 30 days or else the Debt Collector is going to collect your head! Prospect for gold to make money to pay off your debt, but be wary as hopelessness slowly creeps in. Strategically ration your resources, meet the town folk of Drywater, and care for your animal companions.
